text: Yeah Yeah Yeahs is an indie rock band from New York City. They are two boys, Nick Zinner and Brian Chase, and one girl, Karen O. Karen O is the singer. They started in the world of music in 2000. In 2009 a second guitarist, David Pajo, joined the band and replaced Imad Wasif. They have four albums, which are: Fever to Tell, the first, Show Your Bones, the second, It's Blitz!, the third, and the fourth, Mosquito. They play different genres of music: alternative rock, indie rock, art punk, dance punk and post punk revival. They were nominated to the Grammy Awards on 3 occasions: Fever to tell, Show your bones and Itâ€™s blitz!. And they have had 7 nominations to the MTV Awards for three of their works: Maps in 2004, Heads will roll in 2009 and Sacrilege in 2013. title: Yeah Yeah Yeahs
